title: Benny Horowitz from The Gaslight Anthem
itunes:title: Benny Horowitz from The Gaslight Anthem
description:
Episode 204 - Meet your new best friend, Benny Horowitz, the drummer for The Gaslight Anthem. I have loved the band for quite some time and really found Benny to be insightful and funny on other interviews I have heard him do. I DM’d him on Twitter and now, you have this conversation as a result. We discuss MANY things including him putting on shows in New Jersey, the notion of “punk rock guilt” and being a new father. Settle in and enjoy! Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
